text: Usa di kauma de saradaram, jinham ne inakara kita si; ne kiha ki asim tam tuhanu sirafa ika apane varaga inasana dekhade ham ate asim nahim janade ki tuhada ko'i agi'akari ho'i'a honve. Unham de ilava jihare sade vicom nivem padhara de na samajha ate budhihina hana. Ate asim nahim janade ki tuhanu sade upara ko'i utamata prapata hai. Sagom asim tam tuhanu jhutha samajhade ham
